revised_title: Herbert Brereton Baker: A Pioneering Chemist and Educator
tldr: Herbert Brereton Baker was a prominent chemist and educator who made significant contributions to the field of inorganic chemistry and chemical research. He was a dedicated teacher who emphasized thoroughness and meticulousness in his work. Baker's research focused on the effects of moisture on chemical reactions and the development of gas warfare protection during World War I. He was a respected figure in the scientific community and received numerous honors for his work and contributions.
